seo.title: Marina di Praia i ukryte plaże
seo.description: Mniejsze plaże w okolicy: jak do nich dotrzeć i czego się spodziewać.

linkLabel: Marina di Praia i ukryte plaże

sections.title: Nearby coves
body: Rent a kayak to explore Grotta di Suppraiano or take a short boat transfer to secluded spots like Gavitella or Laurito.
Pack reef-friendly sunscreen and water shoes—the rocky seabed offers great snorkeling visibility.

sections.title: Getting there
body: Catch the SITA bus from Positano toward Amalfi; ask the driver for the Marina di Praia stop and walk down the ramp (five minutes).

tips: Book lunch at Il Pirata or La Praia for cliffside dining between swims.
